resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description:
The descriptor should be the same as widgets. For example,

{
	"id": "com.appcelerator.sample.acs",
	"name": "",
	"description" : "ACS Demonstration Sample",
	"author": "",
	"version": "1.0",
	"copyright":"Copyright (c) 2012 by Appcelerator",
	"license":"Public Domain",
	"min-alloy-version": "0.1.16",
	"min-titanium-version":"2.0",
	"tags":"acs,cloud,login,custom objects",
	"platforms":"android,ios,mobileweb"
}
fields.summary: Finalize the app descriptor  for  samples
